If you start dragging something and then you press the Alt key, when you release the mouse if the menu bar was hidden it will appear when you'll relese Alt.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Start draggin something
2. Press and keep pressed Alt
3. Release the mouse and then Alt
Actual Results:  
The menu bar will show up if it was hidden.

Expected Results:  
It shouldn't show up.

This is annoying when you drag something in the search box and you want your results in a new tab. It makes hard to click where you want beacause as soon as you do it the page page goes up because the menu bar will hide again.
However if you press Alt before you start dragging Firefox behaves correctly.

comments.raw_text: This already exists in Firefox 3.6, but is only present on Windows. A Linux build with hidden menus doesn't show this issue.
